---
title: "R and RStudio"
---

This course uses R, RStudio, and Quarto

- R is statistical software
- RStudio is a user interface
- Quarto is an authoring framework for reproducible documents

All are free and open source. To set the software up on your computer, follow the steps in the [Prerequisites](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/intro#prerequisites) section of R4DS. To learn about RStudio, visit the [User Guide](https://docs.posit.co/ide/user).
